attributes.action: STOP URGENTLY sex slavey of under age and kidnapped children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all prostitutes have to register we can check their age (are they over 18) as well as checking if they were kidnapped. Visiting a non-registered prostitute can then be made illegal and we can persecute the men. Visiting a registered prostitute is not illegal and no persecution can follow. This will stop sex slavery in the UK.
